channel.title: Need help with player limiter
channel.description: i would like to make my sever say at the top eg.30/30 players online and go red, rather like frugooscape. At the moment i have the amount of players at the top buy cant seem to find out how to make the colour of it change red when were full and for it to say eg.15/30. Thanks please if you have any idea. Thanks.
